bioconda.name: bioconductor-transview
bioconda.summary: Read density map construction and accession. Visualization of ChIPSeq and RNASeq data sets

biotools.summary: This package provides efficient tools to generate, access and display read densities of sequencing based data sets such as from RNA-Seq and ChIP-Seq.

bioschemas.name: TransView
bioschemas.summary: This package provides efficient tools to generate, access and display read densities of sequencing based data sets such as from RNA-Seq and ChIP-Seq.
